digiclipse.title: DigiClipse
digiclipse.description: Ensure the availability of parts by automating the extraction and verification of part numbers through Excel files and the Digikey API, while managing human errors using Pandas, Python, Docker and APIs.

arcade.title: Arcade
arcade.description: Built an arcade game from scratch, designing both the hardware and software. Programmed gameplay, UI, menus, and settings while optimizing performance for a smooth experience.
